name: Drop Vision
description:
This is for the Mini-Jam 75: Wisdom.  The limitation is weight so I had the characters, which are just circles(I'm not an artist sorry) falling through a level,  hopefully, this is enough to satisfy the limitation. I had the idea of being able to see part of the level and being able to tag stuff, from the wisdom theme. 

Move side to side with AD

Right mouse button and Left mouse button to tag.

Left mouse button to shoot switches.
